CREATE (e1:Issue {description: "File synchronization failing for files larger than 100MB, gets stuck at 67% and eventually times out", steps_to_reproduce: "Attempt to sync a 150MB file, observe progress stalling at approximately 67%", impact: "Affects 15 users, blocking design work", category: "Synchronization Failure", root_cause: "Chunk size set to 10MB causing timeouts"})
CREATE (doc)-[:MENTIONS]->(e1)
CREATE (e2:Resolution {steps: "Reduce chunk size to 5MB, deploy fix to production", deployment_eta: "January 27, 2025 9:00 AM", communication: "Email sent to Alice Brown with ETA update", follow_up: "Follow up with customer within 48 hours"})
CREATE (doc)-[:MENTIONS]->(e2)
